globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
You march toward a training facility for the 501st Legion, also known as Vader's Fist.  Command has informed you that this outpost is critical to Imperial logistical operations. Destroying it could break the Empire's grip in this sector.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} Doors are locked to Imperial figures.

eventActions.theText:
The hoversled carrying the thermal payload is prepped and ready, but you'll need to get it in yourself. You know that this facility is directly connected to a stormtrooper barracks, however, so you expect plenty of resistance.

As you approach the facility, the infamous 501st moves into position to stop you and the sled.

{-} The Rebel mission token represents the explosive payload.
{-} At the start of each Status Phase, if there is at least 1 healthy hero adjacent to the payload, the heroes may advance it. If they do, they move the payload up to 3 spaces.
{-} The payload cannot move through doors, impassable terrain, or blocking terrain.

Now you only need to find the perfect place to activate the detonation.

{-} The mission will progress when a door opens.
Find a weak point in the facility.

{-} Doors are locked to Imperial figures.
{-} The Rebel mission token represents the explosive payload.
{-} At the start of each Status Phase, if there is at least 1 healthy hero adjacent to the payload, the heroes may advance it. If they do, they move the payload up to 3 spaces.
{-} The payload cannot move through doors, impassable terrain, or blocking terrain.
{-} The mission will progress when a door opens.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 6, or when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
The explosives go live, forcing everyone present to flee. The remaining stormtroopers ignore you as they retreat to their own ships. As you fly away, you see the smoking crater that was once an Imperial outpost.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 200 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
You can't get the payload to the structural weak point and you're forced to retreat before Imperial walkers and bomb disposal agents come to undo your work. As you fly away from the outpost, you sigh wearily. You know you'll be seeing more of the 501st Legion, and soon.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Increase the threat level of the next mission (and only the next mission) by 1. During the Rebel Upgrade stage, the Rebel players can decide to spend 50 credits per hero to prevent this.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: Door Open 1
globalEvents.eventText: You open the door into the cramped training facility.

entityProperties.name: Door 1
entityProperties.theText: A weathered transparisteel door leads into the training facility of the 501st Legion.

globalEvents.name: Door Open 2
globalEvents.eventText: You open the door into the cramped training facility.

entityProperties.name: Door 2
entityProperties.theText: A weathered transparisteel door leads into the training facility of the 501st Legion.

entityProperties.name: Door 3
entityProperties.theText: A sturdy door leads deeper into the training facility.

globalEvents.name: Into the Breach
globalEvents.eventText: The building has seen better days, but the lack of luxury only serves to harden the infamous 501st Legion more.

eventActions.theText: The internal defenses are ready for you. You hear shouts and commands as troopers align themselves into position to face you.
At the far end of the facility, you see some load-bearing columns. This is the perfect place for the payload.

entityProperties.name: Weak Point
entityProperties.theText:
The training facility is vulnerable at two load-bearing columns.

{-} The Rebels win when the explosive payload enters the weak point's space.

eventActions.theText:
{-} The neutral mission token represents the weak point.
{-} Doors no longer block movement, adjacency, counting spaces, or line of sight to Imperial figures.
{-} The Rebels win when the explosive payload enters the weak point's space.
Block access to the weak point.
Take the payload to the weak point.

{-} The Rebel mission token represents the explosive payload.
{-} At the start of each Status Phase, if there is at least 1 healthy hero adjacent to the payload, the heroes may advance it. If they do, they move the payload up to 3 spaces.
{-} The payload cannot move through doors, impassable terrain, or blocking terrain.
{-} Doors do not block movement, adjacency, counting spaces, or line of sight to Imperial figures.
{-} The neutral mission token represents the weak point.
{-} The Rebels win when the explosive payload enters the weak point's space.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 6, or when all heroes are wounded.
Are there regular Stormtrooper groups on the map that can accept reinforcements?

globalEvents.name: Reinforcement Yes
globalEvents.eventText: Reinforce 1 Stormtrooper figure adjacent to another Stormtrooper figure of the same group.

globalEvents.name: Reinforcement No
globalEvents.eventText: Alarms keep blaring through the facility.

eventActions.theText: Are there regular Stormtrooper groups on the map that can accept reinforcements?
Are there regular Stormtrooper groups on the map that can accept reinforcements?
How many regular Stormtrooper groups are on the map?

globalEvents.name: Deployment Yes 1
globalEvents.eventText: The legion of troopers is unending. More soldiers rush in to stop you.

enemyGroupData.customText:
{Q} Move 4 to attack {rebel}.
{A} Move 2 to reposition 4.
{A} Move 6 to reposition 4.

eventActions.bonuses:
SQUAD TRAINING: While attacking, each figure in this group gains Pierce 1. If the target has already been attacked during this group's activation, they gain Pierce 2 instead.
VADER'S FINEST: When the first figure in this group declares an attack, add 1 green die to the attack pool.
REINFORCE: After this group's activation, reinforce 1 defeated figure from this group as close as possible to another figure in this group.
